articles.title: Gil Brandt, who helped build Cowboys into 'America's Team,' dies - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Pro Football Hall of Famer Gil Brandt, one of the architects who helped turn the Cowboys from an expansion franchise into "America's Team," has died. He was 91.
articles.content:
Pro Football Hall of Famer Gil Brandt, one of the architects who helped turn the Dallas Cowboys from an expansion franchise into "America's Team," died Thursday. He was 91.
He was the Cowboys' vice … [+5447 chars]
